description: Smallest nontrivial number m such that |first digit - second digit + third digit - fourth digit ...| = n.
mathematica: m = 2; Do[ While[ a = IntegerDigits[ m ]; l = Length[ a ]; e = o = {}; Do[ o = Append[ o, a[ [ 2k - 1 ] ] ], {k, 1, l/2 + .5} ]; Do[ e = Append[ e, a[ [ 2k ] ] ], {k, 1, l/2} ]; Abs[ Apply[ Plus, o ] - Apply[ Plus, e ] ] != n, m++ ]; Print[ m ], {n, 1, 50} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 10 2001
